channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert takes his failed cooling hat invention along on a quest, using it to save the day after being faced with the Riddlemaster?s jibes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Desperate for peace and quiet, an alien leader orders an entertainer to take care of his planet's creatures. However, things nearly go wrong when Konpeki brings a giant cake.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Upset by a surprise her mum springs on her, Sasha asks to be put up for fostering - but she's shocked when she learns a couple want to adopt her. Are they the fit she's hoping for.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Legendary Lioness Jill Scott joins Rattus to look at the history of the beautiful game, including Shakespearean mentions, women?s football being banned and coffins on the pitch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Meet superheroes the Force Force, and some of the 17th century?s greatest minds star in Friends parody Colleagues.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The thrill-seeking eggs go iron-boarding and superhero Slippy Banana saves the day... sort of! Stunt Tomato thrills with a daredevil tightrope trick, the toast soldiers ambush an unsuspecting egg, and Mr and Mrs Strawberry enter a talent show and get a bit of extra help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When Penfold scores a date with superstar Scarlett Johamster, Danger Mouse and the Professor provide conflicting advice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: After breaking a carriage belonging to his beloved Princess, a besotted Prince orders another one from the Ninjas - but the Princess only has eyes for the Ninja Van.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: While proudly testing his new doorbell camera, the Farmer realises he has locked himself out. Bitzer must help his boss get back into the farmhouse while simultaneously making sure he doesn?t spot Timmy and Shaun with a runaway kite.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings turn into crab rescuers, but soon the house is full of them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Dog's old karate teacher retires, Dog decides that the perfect retirement gift would be to keep the sensei?s flame alive and pass on his karate talents - but that doesn?t go down too well with the rest of his reluctant family.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Stinkweasel drops a rain of yukkiness onto the forest, the Fairy Squad, with their excellent flying skills, decide they are the ones for the job. However, Hoofius insists this should be their quest, even if he does hate ick! And when the Fairy Squad get their wings gunked and are unable to fly, the heroes can resume their quest to end Stinkweasel?s reign of stinky nonsense - no flying required.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must convince Soundcheck to get back together again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: A new season at Hawx Academy brings new faces, new challenges and old rivalries.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Shini meets a Blue Peter fan who balances school with life as a farmer! We?re behind the scenes on the new series of Springwatch, and Joel and Shini find out how to take a picture-perfect wildlife snap from a nine-year-old award-winning photographer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Marinette discovers Shanghai and her own origins.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The mood of a raccoon becomes contagious to all those around him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Everyone has a good time getting to hang out as friends and not just dance mates.

channel.desc: Gladiators? stars Apollo and Electro surprise children in a Salford school when they lead a PE lesson with a difference.

channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Shaun tricks Bitzer into thinking he is unwell so that he can stay in the barn playing video games all day. However, before long, the other sheep are also pulling sickies, and Bitzer is starting to get suspicious. The threat of nasty medicine has everyone out of bed in a flash.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When the Baron rearranges the countries of the world, Danger Mouse reluctantly joins forces with his American counterpart Jeopardy Mouse and takes New Zealand for a spin.

channel.desc: It?s Pieface?s turn to look after the class hamster, Space Captain Harrison McScruff-Butt. His own self doubt and Walter?s resolve to sabotage him lead to a rescue mission to free Scruff-Butt from Walter?s mansion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The gang is ready to celebrate Narwhal Day, one of their favourite holidays. However, they discover that it isn't a real holiday, just something Dad made up.

But Boy realizes he doesn?t really have any friends outside his own family. The rest of the siblings set out to help Boy find a friend for the canoe trip - but can he overcome his shyness.

channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mum and Dad go out, leaving Boy in charge of the house. However, busy having fun, his siblings totally ignore Boy's rules.
